TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but... but... I don't want to-(self-concious says to me "Suck it up!") but it contains a virus on the disc that makes the computer.

I wish for a PlayStation 4 in working order.

Granted, but it turns out to also have C4 in every single component.

I wish I lived on the ISS.

Granted, but I now own it. I implement various laws like: no Drinking water, no Smoking, Curfew at 9:00 PM UTC, no breathing air, and so on.

I wish that the Titanic really had been unsinkable.

Granted, but it falls over and floats for eternity.

I wish to make it into my school's Jazz Band.

Granted, but now Jazz is called Razz...berries. Basically this music has a tendency to materialize raspberries out of thin air. Its mostly just annoying really.

I wish that the Earth was floating in Saturn.

Granted, but it is too cold for humans to survive and we all died. Thanks for killing over 7 billion people.

I wish for a PlayStation 4 that is in completey functional and in no way can injure/kill me or itself.

Granted, but ice king comes out of nowhere and steals it.

I wish for new adventure time episodes NO! I want them to start making chowder episodes again!

Granted. But you lose your cable. Forever!

I wish for a turtle.

Granted, but it explodes as soon as you get. You survive, but, you are charged of bombing a pet store.

I wish for a healthy kitten.

Granted, but the ice king comes out of nowhere and steals it (What the hell is wrong with this guy?)

I wish for the NBN to deploy right now, not in 3 years.

Granted, but as soon as it does, KSP merges into the real world, goes into 100,000 time warp mode, the NBN gets thrown into a solar orbit and is destroyed by the Kraken.

I wish I lived on Mars and nothing went wrong at all.

Granted, but soon the martians will come out and kill each and everyone of you.

I wish that the forum will be back in its former glory.

Granted. But another forum derp in July kills it again

I wish that warp drive are built into space ships.

Granted, but they malfunction and all the space ships crash into Neptune.

I wish I could live without my wishes being corrupted!

Granted, but this wish is corrupted too.

I wish this wish will be corrupted.

Granted.

I wish for talents.

Granted. You are now very good at burping.

I wish sal_vager was my slave.

Granted, but I take his place and ban you for slavery

I wish for lemon pie

Granted, but you get lemon party.

I wish for sleep.
Granted. You sleep until the zombie apocolypse, just as zombies bust through your door.

...

I wish that I was the best dang moon football player the world has ever seen

Granted. You kick the only ball to hard and sends it into deep space.(I assume I am thinking of the kind of football your thinking of, the one with the checkered ball)

I wish that I ruled sealand.

Granted, but when you get to Sealand to start your rule, you see a sign that says "Welcome to Sealand!" fall off of a wall and behind it there is another sign that says "Welcome to Rapture!". You are then brutally killed by splicers.

I wish that I was the best dang moon football player the world has ever seen. (the other kind of football this time)

Granted, but you pass a football to your teammate, but he can't catch the ball, so it goes flying into the crowd, killing the President. You are now in prison for murder of the President.

I wish for a Macintosh Computer from 2013 that is in full working order, I can fully access, and can't be broken or stolen.
